member.name: F:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.SelectionMargin
member.summary: Width of left-side "selection margin" for highlighting whole lines when a RichTextBox's ShowSelection property is True

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.Print(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument)
member.summary: Print RichTextBox contents or a range of pages thereof
member.param: Instance of PrintDocument

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.PrintPreview(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog)
member.summary: Preview RichTextBox contents or a range of pages thereof to be printed
member.param: Instance of PrintPreviewDialog
member.returns: Result of Print Preview dialog

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.PageIndexes(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument)
member.summary: Get array of indexes for beginnings of pages
member.param: Instance of PrintDocument

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.SetRightMarginToPrinterWidth(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings)
member.summary: Set RightMargin property of RichTextBox to width of printer page (within horizontal margins) so that text wraps at the same position in the text box as on the printer
member.param: Instance of PageSettings

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.SetPrinterWidthToRightMargin(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings)
member.summary: Set PageSettings right margin to RichTextBox's RightMargin value so that text wraps at the same position on the printer as in the text box
member.param: Instance of PageSettings

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.GetScrollPosition(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox)
member.summary: Get scroll position of RichTextBox
member.returns: Point structure containing current horizontal (.x) and vertical (.y) scroll positions in pixels

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.SetScrollPosition(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Set scroll position of RichTextBox
member.param: Point structure containing new horizontal (.x) and vertical (.y) scroll positions in pixels

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.GetScrollBarInfo(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.ScrollBarType,RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.ScrollBarMask)
member.summary: Get information about a RichTextBox scroll bar
member.param: ScrollBarType value (.Horizontal or .Vertical)
ScrollBarMask flags indicating what to get (range, page size, position, track position; defaults to everything)
member.returns: ScrollInfo structure with requested info

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.GetMaximumWidth(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox)
member.summary: Get effective maximum text width of RichTextBox in pixels
member.returns: Maximum available physical width for any text. (-1 if we're in a recursive loop--see remarks)
member.remarks: This value is calculated as follows: 1. If control's RightMargin propert is non-zero, then that us used 2. Otherwise, if WordWrap is True, then the control's client-area width minus any left-edge "selection" margin is used 3. Otherwise, if horizontal scrollbars are enabled, then the "maximum horizontal scroll position" plus the client width, or the width of the longest physical line, whichever is longer, is used 4. Otherwise, the width of the longest physical line is uesd

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.SetListStyle(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.RTBListStyle)
member.summary: Mark selected text in RichTextBox as a list, using ListStyle
member.param: Style of list (no list, bullets, numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters, lowercase Roman numerals, or uppercase Roman numerals)
member.remarks: RichTextBox.SelectionBullet returns False for any list style other than bullets when read; there is no easy way to GET the specific list-style of selected text even when parsing RTF code (RichTextBox.SelRTF), since, for instance, "I" can just as easily be Roman numeral for 1 OR letter "I", given the way the control defines lists

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.EscapedRTFText(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.String)
member.summary: Convert plain-text string into RTF string
member.param: Plain-text string
member.returns: String with special characters ("{", "\", "}", and non-ASCII) escaped

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.InsertRtf(System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Insert RTF text into rich-text box at a given position
member.param: RTF-format text to insert
position in rich-text box to make insertion (defaults to current selection position if omitted)
member.remarks: This is the "safe" way to insert, as it accounts for "template RTF" that's expected in any inserted RTF text

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.PrintRichTextBox.SetRedrawMode(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns on or off redrawing of rich-text box This can be used to make multiple changes to the text box while preventing the intermediate rendering that would cause flicker
member.param: True to activate auto-redraw, False to deactivate it
member.remarks: Specifying True forces the cumulative results of previous operations to be rendered

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.InsertRtfText
member.summary: InsertRtfText event -- allows user to specify special text (in RTF format)--for specific key sequences-- to insert at caret in place of any selected text
member.param: RichTextBoxEx instance
InsertRtfTextEventArgs instance (INPUT: e.KeyEventArgs = keyboard information from underlying (internal) KeyDown event; OUTPUT: e.RtfText = RTF String to insert (null for no change)
member.remarks: e.RtfText is expected to be a String in RICH-TEXT-FORMAT, not "plain text"!

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.SmartRtfText
member.summary: SmartRtfText event -- allows user to specify text (in RTF format) to replace the incoming character being typed in (and optionally preceding characters) at caret inplace of any selected type
member.param: RichTextBoxEx instance

SmartRtfTextEventArgs instance (INPUT: e.KeyPressEventArgs = incoming keyboard character from underlying (internal) KeyPress event; OUTPUT: e.RtfText = RTF String to replace text with (null for no change), e.PrecedingCharacterCount = number of preceding characters to remove before inserting e.RtfText

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.ChangesMade
member.summary: ChangesMade event -- tracks when a change has been made by the user or programatically (unlike underlying text box's TextChanged event, ignores "temporary" edits [that reverse themselves] during a bigger edit operation of this control)
member.param: RichTextBoxEx instance
EventArgs instance (no parameters)
member.remarks: If this event fires, then the IsTextChanged property is True

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.TextProtected
member.summary: TextProtected event -- tracks when an attempt is made to edit wholly or partially protected text (unlike underlying text box's Protected events, handles attempts to remove local links, and otherwise gives programmer ability to supress usual error warning after handling event)
member.param: RichTextBoxEx instance
CancelEventArgs instance (OUTPUT: e.Cancel = True to pre-empt default warning after event, False (default) to not)

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.HyperlinkClicked
member.summary: HyperlinkClicked event -- tracks when user clicks on a link or custom link; designed to handle custom links (unlike underlying text box's LinkClicked event, handles text/hyperlink of custom links, and distinguishes between multiple adjacent custom links)
member.param: RichTextBoxEx instance
CustomLinkInfoEventArgs istance (OUTPUT: e.CustomLinkInfo instance, with e.CustomLinkInfo.Text = (visible) text, e.CustomLinkInfo.Hyperlink = (invisible) hyperlink)
member.remarks: If the link is a standard (non-custom) RTB link, then e.CustomLinkInfo.Hyperlink = e.CustomLinkInfo.Text

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.EditingWithLinksUnprotected
member.summary: EditingWithLinksUnprotected event -- allows programmer to change regions of text containing custom links (i.e., formatting changes); temporarily unprotects links and disables auto-protection of links, then re-protects links and re-enables auto-protection upon completion
member.param: RichTextBox instances
ParameterEventArgs instance (INPUT/OUTPUT: e.Parameters = information to pass to and receive from this event)

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.#ctor
member.summary: initialize components and search information

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AreLinksProtected
member.summary: Get status of custom-link protection
member.returns: True if custom links are enabled and currently protected, otherwise False
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. This READ-ONLY property can be used to determine if arbitrary edits affecting links can be done in during an event where the protection-status is not guaranteed. If this property returns True, then use the EditWithLinksUnprotected method and the EditingWithLinksUnprotected event to make arbitrary edits that might affect links 2. This property ALWAYS returns False when the control is not in custom-link mode (that is, if DoCustomLinks is False)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AutoDragDropInProgress
member.summary: Get whether an automatic drag-and-drop is in progress
member.returns: True if internal text box is receiving a DragDrop event (only possible if drop is auto-drop or if underlying text box's AllowDrop property is set to True), otherwise False
member.remarks: This property can be used by the outer class's DragDrop event procedure to determine if the rich-text box should handle the drop internally rather than imposing custom logic. To prevent the underlying text box's default drop logic from occurring, the outer class's DragDrop procedure should set e.Effects to DragDropEffects.None. (If custom logic is not bypassed AND e.Effects is NOT set to DragDropEffects.None, then BOTH the custom and default drop logic occur!)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.IsSpellCheckContinuous
member.summary: Gets or sets whether wrinkly lines show under unrecognized words when spell-checking is enabled
member.value: True to enable continuous spell checking, False (default) to disable it
member.returns: True (default) if continuous spell checking is enabled, else False
member.remarks: Continuous spell-check mode is only in effect when BOTH this property AND AllowSpellCheck is True

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.IsTextChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to text has been modified
member.value: True to flag text as modified (ChangesMade event is fired), False (default) to flag it as unmodified
member.returns: True if modified (or flagged as modified), False if not

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.SkipLinksOnReplace
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to Find/Replace is to skip text overrlapping custom links when replacing
member.value: True (default) for avoiding text containing links, False to allow text containing links to be replaced
member.returns: True for avoid links, False to allow replacement
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. When an occurrence of search text containing custom links is replaced, any contained links are replaced in their entirity with the replacement text (along with any adjacent non-link text), even link text just outside the search text 2. This value can only be changed when custom links are allowed--that is, when the DoCustomLinks property is set to True

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.SetColorWithFont
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to allow user to specify color with font when invoking the Font Dialog
member.value: True (default) for setting color and font together, False for just font
member.returns: True for setting color and font together, False for just font
member.remarks: Setting this property to True still allows one to invoke the Color Dialog to set only color

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.ShowToolStrip
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to show ToolStrip above RichTextBox
member.value: True (default) to show ToolStrip, False to hide it
member.returns: True if showing ToolStrip, False if not
member.remarks: All the shortcut keys and special-character options still work if ToolStrip is hidden

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.ShowRuler
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to show TextRuler above RichTextBox
member.value: True (default) to show TextRuler, False to hide it
member.returns: True if showing TextRuler, False if not

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.DoCustomLinks
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to allow arbitrary text to be used as links
member.value: True to allow custom links, False (default) to disallow
member.returns: True if allowing custom links, False if not
member.remarks: 1. Setting this property to True sets the DetectURLs property of the underlying text box to False, and DetectURLs should remain false while this property is True, in order to preserve link formatting when adjacent text is modified 2. While this property is True, the LinkClicked event of the underlying text box returns both the main text and the hypertext in the form {text|hyperlink}, and the HyperlinkClicked event in THIS control returns the text and hyperlink of the link in a CustomLinkInfo instance within CustomLinkInfoEventArgs

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.KeepHypertextOnRemove
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to retain hyperlink text in document when removing custom links, or just return main text
member.value: True to allow keep hyperlinks, False (default) to remove
member.returns: True if keeping links, False if not
member.remarks: If the DoCustomLinks property is False, then this property is always False and attempts to set it to True are ignored

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowTabs
member.summary: Gets or sets whether tabs are supported
member.value: True (default) to allow tabs, False to disallow then
member.returns: True if tab marking is enabled, else False
member.remarks: ShowRuler property must be True, as tabs must be set using ruler

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowSpellCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets whether spell checking is available
member.value: True (default) to enable spell checking, False to disable it
member.returns: True if spell checking is enabled, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowDefaultInsertText
member.summary: Gets or sets whether default custom-text insertions are allowed
member.value: True (default) to enable default custom text, False to disable it
member.returns: True if enabling custom-insert text, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowDefaultSmartText
member.summary: Gets or sets whether default smart-text replacements are allowed
member.value: True (default) to enable default smart text, False to disable it
member.returns: True if enabling smart-text replacement, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowLists
member.summary: Gets or sets whether listing is available
member.value: True (default) to enable lists, False to disable it
member.returns: True if listting is enabled, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowPictures
member.summary: Gets or sets whether picture-inserting is available
member.value: True (default) to enable picture insertion, False to disable it
member.returns: True if picture insertion is enabled, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowSymbols
member.summary: Gets or sets whether smybol-inserting is available
member.value: True (default) to enable smybol insertion, False to disable it
member.returns: True if symbol insertion is enabled, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AllowHyphenation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether hyphenation-searching is available
member.value: True (default) to enable hyphenation-searching, False to disable it
member.returns: True if hyphenation-searching is enabled, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.MaintainSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets whether selection of selected text is restored after Find, Replace, Hyphenation, Spell-Check, or removal of all custom links dialogs in a region
member.value: True (default) to enable re-selection, False to disable it
member.returns: True if re-selection is enabled, else False

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.UnitsForRuler
member.summary: Gets or sets units used for ruler
member.value: TextRuler.UnitType.Inches or TextRuler.UnitType.Centimeters
member.returns: TextRuler.UnitType.Inches or TextRuler.UnitType.Centimeters

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.RightMargin
member.summary: Gets or set maximum width of all lines of text in pixels
member.value: Text width in pixels
member.returns: Text width in pixels
member.remarks: This is the same as the underlying rtb.RightMargin value, except that setting it IMMEDIATELY affects the rich-text box and ruler

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets plain text in text box
member.value: New plain Text (ChangesMade event is fired if a change in existing text or formatting occurs)
member.returns: Existing plain Text
member.remarks: This is the same as the underlying rtb.Text value, except that setting always marks the text as modified

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.Rtf
member.summary: Gets or sets RTF text in text box
member.value: New RTF Text (ChangesMade event is fired if different from existing)
member.returns: Existing RTF Text
member.remarks: This is the same as the underlying rtb.Rtf value

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets directory for any text and pictures saved for loaded
member.value: New file path
member.returns: Existing file path

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.SaveFile(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType)
member.summary: Save contents of the rich-text box
member.param: Name of RTF/plain-text file (if null or omitted, then a file dialog is invoked)
Format of file (user-specified if -1 or omitted)
member.returns: False if dialog was canceled, True if text was saved
member.remarks: When saving as plain text, any custom links take the form "{text|hyperlink}"

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.LoadFile(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType)
member.summary: Load a file into the rich-text box
member.param: Name of RTF/plain-text file (if null or omitted, then a file dialog is invoked)
Format of file (user-specified if -1 or omitted)
member.returns: False if dialog was canceled, True if text was loaded

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.InsertPicture(System.String)
member.summary: pastes a picture into the rich-text box at where text is selected
member.param: Name of picture file (if null or omitted, then a file dialog is invoked)
member.returns: False if dialog was canceled, True (and ChangesMade event is fired) if picture was inserted

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.CheckForCustomLink(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: find out if a link is at the given position
member.param: position to check for link (current caret position if ommitted or negative)
True to look backwards from position, False (default if omitted) to look forwards from position
member.returns: CustomLinkInfo instance with starting position, text, and hyperlink
member.remarms: NOTES: 1. An exception is thrown if the custom links are disallowed (if the DoCustomLinks property is False) 2. If no link is present at the given position, then Nothing is returned

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.AddCustomLink(RichTextBoxEx.CustomLinkInfo@)
member.summary: add link with given information
member.param: Information about insertion position, text, and hyperlink
member.returns: True if added, False if not
member.remarks: >NOTES: 1. An exception is thrown if the custom links are disallowed (if the DoCustomLinks property is False), or if CustomLinkInfo contains invalid data 2. If a link is successfully added, then a. the caret moves to the end of the link, and b. a "hidden" syllable hyphen is prepended the link text/hyperlink info, CustomLinkInfo.Position is incremented by 1

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.RemoveCustomLink(System.Int32)
member.summary: remove link at a given position
member.param: Starting position of link
member.returns: True if link removed, False if not
member.remarms: >NOTES: 1. An exception is thrown if the custom links are disallowed (if the DoCustomLinks property is False), or if position is invalid 2. If link is successfully removed, then caret move to end of de-linked text 3. If the KeepHyperlinksOnRemove property is True, then the de-linked text is of the form "{text|hyperlink}", including both main text and hyperlink text; otherwise, it is "text", including only the main text

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.GetCustomLinks(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a list of all custom links currently existing in selection or document
member.param: True to get custom links in selected text only, False (default) to get links in entire document
member.returns: Array of CustomLinkInfo instances with each link's position, visible text, and hyperlink text
member.remarks: An exeption is thrown if custom links are disallowed (if DoCustomLinks is False)

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.RichTextBoxEx.EditWithLinksUnprotected(System.Object@)
member.summary: Temporarily unprotect custom link and disable auto-protection of links, then fire EditingWithLinksUnprotected event to allow programmatic edits to regions containing custom links (i.e., formatting changes)
member.param: Information to be give to and receive from the EditingWithLinksUnprotected event's procedure (can be omitted for no info)
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. An exeption is thrown if custom links are disallowed (if DoCustomLinks is False) 2. Links are re-protected and auto-protection is re-enabled after the event finishes, even if the event's procedure throws an unhandled exception 3. This method is ignored if the EditingWithLinksUnprotected event is ALREADY being processed

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.CustomLinkInfo
member.summary: Information about a link--position, visible text, and invisible hyperlink

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.InsertRtfTextEventArgs
member.summary: Event Arguments for InsertRtfText event--which allows one to specify custom text for specific key sequences
member.remarks: If KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress is True, then no change is made to text

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.InsertRtfTextEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Supplies initial keyboard information
member.param: KeyEventArgs instance for underlying KeyDown event

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.InsertRtfTextEventArgs.RtfText
member.summary: RTF text to be inserted
member.value: Text to be inserted in RTF format
member.returns: Text to be inserted in RTF format
member.remarks: Defaults to null for making no change, except any default text allowed

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.InsertRtfTextEventArgs.KeyEventArgs
member.summary: Keyboard information
member.value: KeyEventArgs instance from underlying KeyDown event
member.returns: KeyEventArgs instance from underlying KeyDown event
member.remarks: Set KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress to True ensure that NO text is inserted, even any default text

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.SmartRtfTextEventArgs
member.summary: Event Arguments for SmartRtfText event-- which allows one to replace a recent set of characters (including an incoming one) with custom text
member.remarks: If no RTF text or length of text to replace is specified on output, no change is made to text

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.SmartRtfTextEventArgs.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs)
member.summary: Supplies initial keyboard information
member.param: KeyPressEventArgs instance for underlying KeyPress event

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.SmartRtfTextEventArgs.RtfText
member.summary: Smart text to be inserted
member.value: Smart text to be inserted in RTF format
member.returns: Smart text to be inserted in RTF format
member.remarks: Defaults to null for making no change

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.SmartRtfTextEventArgs.PrecedingCharacterCount
member.summary: Number of characters to replace prior to incoming character
member.value: # of characters to replace
member.returns: # of characters to replace
member.remarks: Characters preceding the incoming character are removed before smart text is inserted

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.SmartRtfTextEventArgs.KeyPressEventArgs
member.summary: Keyboard information
member.value: KeyEventArgs instance from underlying KeyPress event
member.returns: KeyEventArgs instance from underlying KeyPress event
member.remarks: e.KeyChar is the incoming character

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.CustomLinkInfoEventArgs
member.summary: Event Arguments for HyperlinkClicked event-- returns CustomLinkInfo instance with position, text, and hyperlink
member.remarks: If custom links are not enabled, then position is -1 and text and hyperlink are the same

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.CustomLinkInfoEventArgs.CustomLinkInfo
member.summary: Information about text and hyperlink link
member.returns: .Text = (visible) text, and .Hyperlink = (invisible) hyperlink

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.ParameterEventArgs
member.summary: Event Arguments for EditingWithLinksUnprotected event--which allows one to specify information for event

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.ParameterEventArgs.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Supplies initial event information
member.param: Information for event

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.ParameterEventArgs.Parameters
member.summary: Information for event procedure
member.value: Information supplied to event
member.returns: Information returned from event

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.UnitType
member.summary: Enumerations for ruler's units (inches or centimeters)

member.name: T:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.MarkerType
member.summary: Enumerations for margin, indent, and tab markers

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.IndentsChanged
member.summary: Event for tracking a change in indent(s) by user
member.param: TextRuler instance
INPUT: e.MarkerType = type of indent(s) changed

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.MarginsChanged
member.summary: Event for tracking a change in margin by user
member.param: TextRuler instance
INPUT: e.MarkerType = type of margin changed

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabAdded
member.summary: Event for tracking a new tab being added by user
member.param: TextRuler instance
INPUT: e.NewPosition = position of new tab

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabRemoved
member.summary: Event for tracking an existing tab being removed by user

INPUT: e.OldPosition = position of deleted tab

member.name: E:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabChanged
member.summary: Event for tracking an existing tab being moved by user

INPUT: e.NewPosition = mew position of tab, and e.OldPosition = previous position of tab

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.#ctor
member.summary: Initialize control

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.MarkerUnderMouse
member.summary: Which margin or indent(s) is/are the mouse hovering over or dragging?
member.returns: Type of marker (MarkerType.No_Marker if none)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabUnderMouse
member.summary: Which tab is the mouse hovering over or dragging?
member.returns: Tab position number (MarkerType.No_Marker if none)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether ruler can be used to handle tabs
member.value: True to enable, False to disable
member.returns: True (default) if enabled, False if disabled

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.MaximumTabs
member.summary: Gets or sets maximum number of tabs allowed when tabs are enabled
member.vale: Number of tabs allowed (must be non-negative)
member.returns: Number of tabs allowed (defaults to 32)
member.remarks: If number of existing tabs is greater than value given, then this property is not changed

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabPositionsInUnits
member.summary: Gets or sets positions of tabs in inches/centimeters, depending on value of Units property
member.value: Array of new tab positions
member.returns: Array of existing tab positions

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.TabPositions
member.summary: Gets or sets positions of tabs in pixels
member.value: Array of new tab positions
member.returns: Array of existing tab positions

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.PixelsPerCentimeter
member.summary: Gets number of pixels per centimeter
member.returns: Number of pixels/cm

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.PixelsPerInch
member.summary: Gets number of pixels per inch
member.returns: Number of pixels/inch

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.Units
member.summary: Gets or sets whether units are inches or centimeters
member.value: New type of unit
member.returns: Existing type of unit (default is inches)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.ToolTipText
member.summary: Gets or sets normal tooltip for ruler
member.value: New tooltip text
member.returns: Existing tooltip text (defaults to null)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.UsingSmartToolTips
member.summary: Gets or sets whether tooltip becomes name of marker when mouse is over one
member.value: True for yes (use marker names when over markers), False for no (always stick with standard ToolTipText)
member.returns: True (default) or yes, False for no

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets color of ruler's border
member.value: New border color
member.returns: Existing border color (defaults to black)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.ZoomFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets zoom factor for ruler
member.value: Factor to multiply "true" margin/indent/tab positions by (must be positive!)
member.returns: Factor by which "true" positions are multiplied
member.remarks: Changing the zoom factor only changes the visual scaling of the ruler and of the positions of markers; if DOES NOT effect the values gotten/set for the margin, indent, and tab properties (that is, their pixel/unit values are always treated as if ZoomFactor were 1.0).

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.BaseColor
member.summary: Gets or sets base color for ruler
member.value: New base color
member.returns: Existing base color (defaults to white)

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.RulerWidth
member.summary: Get or sets the maximum width of ruler, including margins, in pixels
member.value: Maximum width for ruler area in pixels, including margins
member.returns: Maximum width of ruler area in pixels, including margins
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. Value cannot be too narrow to allow space between the rightmost left-indent and the right indent 2. This is PrintableWidth plus any margin widths

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.PrintableWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets width of area within margins of ruler, in pixels
member.value: The maximum printable area within margins in pixels
member.returns: The maximum printable area with margins in pixels
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. Value cannot be too narrow to allow space between the rightmost left-indent and the right indent 2. This is MaximumWidth minus any margin widths

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.ScrollingOffset
member.summary: Get or sets the scrolling offset of ruler
member.value: Scrolling offset for ruler area in pixels
member.returns: Scrolling offset of ruler area in pixles
member.remarks: Value cannot be larger than maximum ruler width

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.NoMargins
member.summary: Gets or sets whether margins are disabled
member.value: True to disable (no margins), False to enable (margins allowed)
member.returns: True if disabled (default), False if enabled
member.remarks: NOTE: If margins pre-exist, then the left and right indent properties are adjusted to point to the same locations as before

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.LeftMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets left margin, in pixels whenever ZoomFactor = 1
member.value: New margin (NoMargins property must be False)
member.returns: Existing margin (defaults to 0)
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. If NoMargins property is True, margin will not be set 2. Left margin cannot be set to move rightmost left indent too close to right indent

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.RightMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets right margin, in pixels whenever ZoomFactor = 1
member.value: New margin
member.returns: Existing margin (defaults to 0)
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. If NoMargins property is True, margin will not be set 2. Right margin cannot be set to move right indent too close to rightmost left indent

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.HangingIndent
member.summary: 'Gets or sets left hanging indent--offset, in pixels whenever ZoomFactor = 1, from first-line left indent for all lines in a paragraph after the first (negative for "first-line" indent, 0 for no indent offset, positive for true "hanging" indent)
member.value: New offset from left indent
member.returns: Existing offset from left indent (defaults to 0)
member.remarks: NOTE: Hanging indent may not be set to get left of left margin

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.FirstLineIndent
member.summary: Gets or sets first-line indent--offset, in pixels whenever ZoomFactor = 1, from any left margin of the first line in a paragraph without changing indent of subsequent lines
member.value: New first-line left-indent value
member.returns: Existing first-line left-indent value (the same as LeftIndent property when reading; defaults to 0)
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. First-line indent cannot be set to move left of left margin or right of right indent 2. This moves only the indent of the first-line in each paragraph; the indent of subsequent lines remains unchanged, causing HangingIndent property to be counter-offset

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.LeftIndent
member.summary: Gets or sets left indent--offset, in pixels whenever ZoomFactor = 1, from any left margin of first line in paragraph, moving indendation of subsequent lines along with it,
member.value: New first-line left-indent value (cannot be make other lines go left of left MARGIN!)
member.returns: Existing first-line left-indent value (the same as FirstLineIndent property when reading; defaults to 0)
member.remarks: NOTES: 1. Left indent cannot be set to move left of left margin or right of right indent 2. All lines in paragraph are moved the same distance left or right, causing HangingIndent property to remain unchanged

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.RightIndent
member.summary: Gets or sets right indent--offset, in pixels whenever ZoomFactor = 1, from any right margin
member.value: New right-indent value
member.returns: Existing right-indent value (defaults to 0)
member.remarks: NOTE: Right indent cannot be set to move right of right margin or left of leftmost left indent

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.UnitsToPixels(System.Single)
member.summary: Convert value from current unit type (inches or centimeters) to pixels
member.param: Value in units specified by Units property
member.returns: Equivalent value in pixels

member.name: M:RichTextBoxEx.TextRuler.PixelsToUnits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert value from pixels to current unit type (inches or centimeters)
member.param: Value in pixels
member.returns: Equivalent value in units specified by Units property

Original location of tab

member.name: P:RichTextBoxEx.TabEventArgs.OldPosition
member.summary: Get original position of tab
